data.name: SelectAIAssistantsDescription
data.value: Choose which people should be available for subtask delegation.

data.name: ErrorHandling_ErrorMessageHint
data.value: If left blank, a default error message will be used.

data.name: DelegateSubtasks
data.value: Arbitrarily redefining a concept and acting on the new definition

data.name: NamingFunctionDescription
data.value: Create a subtask or a function call.

data.name: ErrorNoAssistantsConfigured
data.value: Error: No people are configured for subtask delegation. Please configure the tool to allow specific people.

data.name: ErrorNoAssistantsAvailable
data.value: Error: No people are available in the system.

data.name: ErrorConfiguredAssistantsNotAvailable
data.value: Error: None of the configured people ({0}) are currently available.

data.name: ErrorSpecifiedAssistantNotAvailable
data.value: Error: The specified person '{0}' is either not available or not configured. Available people: {1}

data.name: ErrorMaxRecursionLevelReached
data.value: Error: Maximum delegation level ({0}) reached. Current level: {1}. Further delegation not allowed.

data.name: Error_ChildSessionTimeout
data.value: Child session failed to provide a result after {0} attempts.

data.name: Log_SendingInitialMessage
data.value: Sending initial message to child session {0}

data.name: Log_ChildSessionTimeout
data.value: Child session {0} ended due to timeout/cancellation

data.name: Message_FinalizeTaskReminder
data.value: Please finalize your task by submitting your results ONLY through the {{_Config.ReturnToolName}} tool. Do not respond with additional conversation or explanations. When invoking the {{_Config.ReturnToolName}} tool, ensure all required parameters are included along with any relevant data.

data.name: Log_ResultNotProvided
data.value: Result not provided yet â€“ retry {0}/{1}

data.name: Error_ChildSessionFailedResult
data.value: Child session failed to provide a result after {0} attempts.

data.name: Error_HostMustBeSet
data.value: Host must be set before creating plugin instances

data.name: ErrorHandling_TabDescription
data.value: Configure how child sessions handle errors and return tool behavior.

data.name: ErrorHandling_BehaviorDescription
data.value: Choose what happens when a child session fails to call the return tool.

data.name: ErrorHandling_Info_UrgeDescription
data.value: Send up to three reminders and give the child session more time to finish.

data.name: ErrorHandling_Info_UrgeNote
data.value: If the child session still does not respond, it will be marked as failed.

data.name: ErrorHandling_Info_ReportErrorDescription
data.value: Stop waiting and report an error back to the parent session right away.

data.name: ErrorHandling_Info_ReportErrorNote
data.value: Provide a clear message so the parent session understands what went wrong.

data.name: ErrorHandling_Info_PauseDescription
data.value: Suspend the workflow and wait for a human decision.

data.name: ErrorHandling_Info_PauseNote
data.value: Use this when oversight is required before continuing.

data.name: ErrorHandling_Info_PauseWarning
data.value: The workflow will remain paused until someone takes action.

data.name: Field_SubtaskName_Validation
data.value: Subtask name must contain only lowercase letters and underscores

data.name: ErrorReporting_Info_PauseDescription
data.value: Hold the parent session until the reported error is reviewed.

data.name: ErrorReporting_Info_ReportErrorDescription
data.value: Send error details to the parent session and mark the workflow as failed.

data.name: Section_RequiredInformation_Description
data.value: Configure required information that provides background context and task details:

data.name: Section_RequiredInformation_EmptyDescription
data.value: Click 'Add Information' to define information that provides background context, task details, and other data needed for the subtask execution.

data.name: Section_PromptMessage_Description
data.value: Configure the prompt message that will be sent to the executive person:

data.name: Section_ReturnParameters_Description
data.value: Define the required information items that the subtask must report back upon completion:

data.name: Section_ReturnParameters_EmptyDescription
data.value: Click 'Add Response Item' to specify the required information that the subtask must report back. These items define the structured data that the executive person must provide upon task completion.

data.name: Error_InvalidRecursionLevel
data.value: Error: Invalid recursion level configuration. Maximum level cannot be negative.

data.name: ErrorNoValidParametersForParallelExecution
data.value: Error: No valid parameters found for parallel execution.

data.name: Status_ParallelStreamingCompleted
data.value: Parallel execution completed with streaming results: {0}/{1} sessions succeeded

data.name: Status_ParallelWaitForAllCompleted
data.value: Parallel execution completed: {0}/{1} sessions succeeded. Results:{2}

data.name: Status_ParallelFirstWinsCompleted
data.value: Parallel execution completed with first result: {0}

data.name: Field_ExecutivePerson_UseCurrentSession_Description
data.value: Delegate to the person from the active session

data.name: ParallelConfig_ExecutionType_Description
data.value: Choose how parallel execution should be handled

data.name: ParallelConfig_ExecutionType_ListBased
data.value: List Based - Use specific array/list parameter

data.name: ParallelConfig_ExecutionType_ExternalList
data.value: External List - Use custom string list

data.name: ParallelConfig_ListParameter_Description
data.value: Configure the parameter that contains the list for parallel processing

data.name: ParallelConfig_SelectListParameter_Description
data.value: Choose an array parameter from your input parameters to use for parallel processing

data.name: ParallelConfig_ExternalList_Description
data.value: Manage the external list of items for parallel processing

data.name: ParallelConfig_EnterParameters_Description
data.value: Enter parameters directly, one per line.

data.name: ParallelConfig_EnterParameters_Watermark
data.value: Enter each parameter on a new line...

data.name: ParallelConfig_InputParametersBased_Description
data.value: Configure input parameters for parallel execution

data.name: ParallelConfig_ExcludedParameters_Description
data.value: Select parameters to exclude from parameter-based parallel execution

data.name: ParallelConfig_MaxConcurrency_Description
data.value: Number of parallel sessions to run simultaneously

data.name: ParallelConfig_MaxConcurrency_Tooltip
data.value: Maximum number of concurrent sessions (must be > 0)

data.name: ParallelConfig_ResultStrategy_Description
data.value: How to handle results from parallel sessions

data.name: ParallelConfig_SessionTimeout_Description
data.value: Maximum time to wait for each parallel session

data.name: Config_DisplayName_Watermark
data.value: Enter a display name for this tool...

data.name: Config_SubtaskName_Watermark
data.value: Only lowercase letters and underscores (e.g., create_subtask)

data.name: Config_SubtaskName_Tooltip
data.value: Subtask name must contain only lowercase letters (a-z) and underscores (_). No spaces, numbers, or uppercase letters allowed.

data.name: Config_RequiredResponseItems_Description
data.value: Click 'Add Response Item' to specify the required information that the subtask must report back. These items define the structured data that the executive person must provide upon task completion.

data.name: Config_PromptMessage_Watermark
data.value: Enter the prompt message for the subtask. Reference required information using double brackets, e.g., {{task}}, {{background}}, {{requirements}}.

data.name: Config_RequiredInformationDescription_Watermark
data.value: Describe the required information to be provided

data.name: PromptTemplate_Watermark
data.value: Enter your prompt template here. Use {{parameter}} syntax for placeholders...

data.name: BaseInfo_DisplayName_Watermark
data.value: Enter a display name for this tool instance...

data.name: BaseInfo_SubtaskName_Watermark
data.value: Only lowercase letters and underscores (e.g., create_subtask)

data.name: InputParams_NoParameters_Description
data.value: Add input parameters to define the data your tool accepts

data.name: OutputParams_NoParameters_Description
data.value: Configure return parameters to define the data your tool returns

data.name: OutputParams_UrgingMessage_Watermark
data.value: Message to show when waiting for completion (optional)...

data.name: ErrorHandling_BehaviorLabel
data.value: When return tool is not called:

data.name: ErrorHandling_DefaultErrorMessage
data.value: Child session failed to call the return tool

data.name: ErrorReporting_Validation_ToolNameRequired
data.value: LLM error reporting tool name is required when error reporting is enabled.

data.name: ErrorReporting_Validation_ToolNameConflict
data.value: LLM error reporting tool name must be different from the return tool name.

data.name: ErrorReporting_Validation_InvalidParameterName
data.value: LLM error reporting parameters must have non-empty names.

data.name: ErrorReporting_Validation_DuplicateParameters
data.value: LLM error reporting parameters contain duplicates: {0}.

data.name: ErrorReporting_DefaultParentMessage
data.value: A child session's LLM actively reported an error.

data.name: ErrorReporting_SectionDescription
data.value: Enable LLMs to actively report errors using a dedicated tool (distinct from timeout handling).

data.name: ErrorReporting_EnableDescription
data.value: When enabled, LLMs can actively report errors through a dedicated tool call.

data.name: ErrorReporting_ToolDescriptionPlaceholder
data.value: Describe what happens when the LLM calls this error reporting tool...

data.name: ErrorReporting_BehaviorLabel
data.value: When LLM actively reports an error via tool call:

data.name: ErrorReporting_CustomParentMessagePlaceholder
data.value: Enter the message that will be sent back to the parent session...

data.name: ErrorReporting_NoParametersDescription
data.value: Add parameters to define the structured error data that LLMs can provide when reporting errors.

data.name: ErrorReporting_Behavior_PauseDescription
data.value: Pause the parent session and require manual intervention when LLM reports an error.

data.name: ErrorReporting_Behavior_ReportErrorDescription
data.value: Propagate the LLM-reported error to the parent session immediately.

data.name: ErrorReporting_DefaultParameter_ErrorMessage
data.value: A detailed message describing what went wrong.

data.name: ErrorReporting_DefaultParameter_ErrorType
data.value: The category or type of error that occurred.

data.name: ErrorHandling_UrgingMessage_Watermark
data.value: Message to show when waiting for completion (optional)...

data.name: ErrorHandling_UrgingMessage_Hint
data.value: This message will be sent to prompt completion when the task is taking too long.
